attributes.action: negotiate to terminate any form of subsidy to animal husbadry in Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eating animals is inefficient land use.
Peasants are not as profitable as animals.
OK.
Peasants might be currently less socially acceptable to consume as food as animals.
Equalise it.
Label animal products to discourage their production.
